official-title.#text:
To exempt from Lacey Act Amendments of 1981 certain water transfers by the North Texas Municipal
			 Water District and the Greater Texoma Utility Authority, and for other
			 purposes.

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on the

, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such
			 provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: North Texas Invasive Species Barrier Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: North Texas Invasive Species Barrier Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, shall not apply with respect to any water transfer by the North
			 Texas Municipal Water District and the Greater Texoma Utility Authority
			 using only closed conveyance systems from the Lake Texoma raw water intake
			 structure to treatment facilities at which all genera and species
			 prohibited in accordance with such Act or such section, respectively, are
			 extirpated and removed from the water transferred.

header.#text: Compliance with Lacey Act Amendment of 1981

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4032 IH: North Texas Invasive Species Barrier Act of 2014
